code: import firebase from"../configs/firebase-config.js";var socialMediaAuth=function socialMediaAuth(provider){return firebase.auth().signInWithPopup(provider).then(function(res){var userName=res.additionalUserInfo.username;var userToken=res.credential.accessToken;return{userToken:userToken,userName:userName};}).catch(function(er){return er;});};export default socialMediaAuth;
